title: Russia: We're still working on retaliatory measures against Britain
text:
Russia: We're still working on retaliatory measures against Britain 9:16am EDT - 00:51 
  retaliatory action against Britain's ''unfriendly measures'' after the Sergei Skripal poisoning are to be expected in the near future.   retaliatory action against Britain's "unfriendly measures" after the Sergei Skripal poisoning are to be expected in the near future.  //reut.rs/2Irmq8T
